title: Topic 001 Question 095
body: A company stores critical data in Amazon S3 buckets. A SysOps administrator must build a solution to record all S3 API activity.
Which action will meet this requirement?
options: Configure S3 bucket metrics to record object access logs.
Create an AWS CloudTrail trail to log data events for all S3 objects.
Enable S3 server access logging for each S3 bucket.
Use AWS IAM Access Analyzer for Amazon S3 to store object access logs.
